greeting: Greetings from The On-Line Encyclopedia of Integer Sequences! http://oeis.org/

results.name: a(n) = Product_{d|n, d+1 is prime} A008578(1+[Sum_{i=0..A286561(n,1+d)} A320000((n/d)/((1+d)^i), 1+d)]). Here A286561(n,k) gives the k-valuation of n (for k > 1).
link: Antti Karttunen, Table of n, a(n) for n = 1..16384
program: A320000sq(n, k) = if(1==n, if(1==k,2,1), sumdiv(n, d, if(d>=k && isprime(d+1), my(p=d+1, q=n/d); sum(i=0, valuation(n, p), A320000sq(q/(p^i), p))))); \\ From A320000
A322310(n) = if(1==n,3,my(m=1); fordiv(n,d, my(s, p=d+1, q=n/d); if(isprime(p) && (s = sum(i=0,valuation(n, p), A320000sq(q/(p^i),p))), m *= prime(s))); (m));
results.author: _Antti Karttunen_, Dec 03 2018
